arguments.name: begname
arguments.desc: Name of the start-bone of the chain

arguments.name: endname
arguments.desc: Name of the end-bone of the chain

arguments.name: target
arguments.desc: World target position that the "endname" bone should reach

arguments.name: weight
arguments.desc: Weight [0,1] of this animation, default is 1.0

arguments.name: history
arguments.desc: How much of the previous frames result [0,1] that should be used when start the IK search, default is 0.0

arguments.name: flag
arguments.desc: TRUE if constraints should be used, default is TRUE
